  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()

    • combatLoop

      public void combatLoop()
      This method is the main loop of the combat system. It will loop through the turn order and execute the moves of each creature. It will also check if the combat is over. It waits for action to not be null to continue. The action is preferbly chosen in the controller

    • getCombatIsOver

      public boolean getCombatIsOver()
      Returns true if the combat is over.
      Returns:
      true if combat is over, otherwise returns false

    • getEnemyCreature
